channel.title: Please, I need help with adding shops! They DC me and idk how add new 1s
channel.description:
Please help, I downloaded Tos-Scape and it has about 40 shops in shops.cfg. I dont know where any are, so I decided to add new ones. I did a tut, but I dont know how to do autospawn or anything. Some of the regular shops like horvick, i trade, and it DC's Me. How do i stop this and how do i add new shops?? Please write here, pm me, or message me on msn. Kousinzack92@earthlink.net <------My MSN.
THANKS
